name: Puff Walker
description:
Credits

Created by Pablo Montijo with Assets from MSU

Instructor: Declan McClintock, Brian Winn

Major Modifications

1: Created Level One. Added platforms and pickups to familiarize the player with the user interface.

2: Created Level Two. Change the game theme to the 'Robot Environment'. Added moving platforms and jump pads to increase the game complexity. 

3: Created Level Three. Added several jump pads and moving platforms arranged in a vertical fashion as well as two doors to maximize game complexity. Even though this level is challenging the player will be able to finish it.

 Minor Modifications.

-Used the robot themed assets

-Modified the Main Menu Fonts

-Switched in game music for level 3

 Game Instructions

 -Finish level 3. Get to the first door to pick up to open the second door which leads to the goal. For Level 3, I recommend switching to a top-down view to more easily complete the level. 

 If the keyboard is used:

 

-Move FWD with 'W'

-Move LEFT with 'A'

-Move Right with 'D'

-Move Back with 'S'

-Jump with Spacebar

 

If a gamepad is used:

 

Use the left stick to move

Use the right stick to control the camera

Jump with Button 'A'
